name: Krave Sweet Chipotle Beef Jerky
intro: Made from authentic Mexican chipotle, this jerky brings together natural smokiness, a sensation of moderate heat, and a hint of honey to create the perfect balance of sweet and smoky. Tender slices of domestic beef are double marinated and then baked, resulting in an extraordinarily moist, soft and chewable jerky. Ol¨¦!
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), water, honey, spices (including paprika), vinegar powder, sea salt, citric acid, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c

name: Krave Chili Lime Beef Jerky
intro: Tease your taste buds with tender slices of knuckle-cut domestic beef teamed with medium-hot chili and finally balanced with zesty lime. This marvelously moist jerky is easy to tear and share, and its unique profile provides a dose of medium heat that partners well with the acidity of the citrus.
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), garlic chili sauce (chili, garlic, vinegar, sugar, salt), spices (including paprika), lemon juice, lime juice powder, garlic powder, onion powder, sea salt, celery juice powder.  Allergen: soy
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c

name: Krave Pineapple Orange Beef Jerky
intro: Say aloha to our pineapple orange beef jerky, a Hawaiian-inspired offering of tender top round sirloin domestic beef marinated in a blend of sweet orange, pineapple and tropical fruit. Slices are carefully baked to preserve their unique flavor of sweetness and acidity, making an exceptionally moist and addictive combination.
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol) water, molasses, mirin, soybean oil, pineapple juice, orange juice, spices, sea salt, pineapple juice powder, orange juice powder, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c

name: Krave Garlic Chili Pepper Beef Jerky
intro: Our garlic chili pepper beef jerky is for those who savor spicy flavor. A robust garlic and chili marinade soaks each tender slice of top round sirloin domestic beef, and is finished with real chili flakes to pack an extra punch. The result is a moist, tasty jerky that teases your taste buds with flavors of garlic, light salt, medium soy sauce and a crescendo of spices.
ingredients: Beef, evaporated cane syrup, low sodium gluten free soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), garlic chili sauce (chili, garlic, vinegar, sugar, salt), spices, garlic powder, sea salt, celery juice powder. Allergen: soy
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c

name: Krave Five Peppercorn Beef Jerky
intro: Our unique, freshly ground five peppercorn blend is balanced with just a hint of garlic, resulting in the perfect combination of savory flavors with a bit of spice. Life is better beefy!
ingredients: Beef, Gluten Free Soy Sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol), Cane Sugar. Contains 2% or Less of the Following: Granulated Garlic, Onion Powder, Spices, Vinegar Powder. Made in facility that processes soy.
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c

name: Krave Sesame Ginger Beef Jerky
intro: Savor the flavor of tender, delicious slices of beefy goodness drenched in toasted sesame and fresh ginger marinade. A twist of traditional Asian flavors that's sure to satisfy your KRAVING.
ingredients: Beef, Cane Sugar, Gluten Free Soy Sauce (water, soybeans, salt, alcohol). Contains 2% or Less of the Following: Granulated Garlic, Onion Powder, Ginger Puree, Toasted Sesame Oil, Ginger Powder, Vinegar Powder, Black Pepper, Sesame Seeds. Made in facility that processes soy.
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c

name: Krave Cabernet Rosemary Beef Jerky
intro: California Cabernet and aromatic rosemary come together harmoniously to create this rich, and highly addictive jerky that is truly a reflection of KRAVE's wine country roots!
ingredients: Beef, Cabernet Sauvignon Wine, Cane Sugar. Contains 2% or Less of the Following: Granulated Garlic, Onion Powder, Sea Salt, Spices. Made in facility that processes soy.
creator: 54d45779c82c2d706e82986c
